搑字的基本解释

搑
róng
推捣。
收。

搑
náng
窒。

搑
nǎng
撞；刺。

搑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［róng］
［《廣韻》而容切，平鍾，日。］
(1)推捣。
(2)收。
[②]［náng］
［《集韻》濃江切，平江，娘。］
窒。
[③]［nǎng］
［《集韻》匿講切，上講，娘。］
同“擃1”。
撞，刺。

搑字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　搑； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页446第21
【唐韻】而隴切【集韻】乳勇切，?音宂。【說文】推擣也。　又【唐韻】而容切【集韻】如容切，?音茸。義同。一曰收也。　又【集韻】濃江切，音膿。讀若搦平聲。義同。【說文】又窒也。　又【集韻】匿講切。與擃同。見擃字註。

搑字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
搑字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Pinch
róng
Push and pound.
Close.
Pinch
náng
Choking.
Pinch
nǎng
Bump; thorn.
Pinch
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［róng］
["Guangyun" and Rongqie, Pingzhong, Day. ]
(1) Push and pound.
(2) Receive.
[②]［náng］
["Jiyun" Nongjiangqie, Pingjiang, Niang. ]
Choking.
[③]［nǎng］
["Ji Yun" talk about cutting secretly, talk about it, mother. ]
Same as "擃1".
Bump, stab.
Pinch
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　搑; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 446-21
[Tang Yun] and Longqie 【Jiyun】Breast and courageous cut,? Sound. [Said the text] Push and pound also.　[Tang Yun] and Rongqie【Jiyun】like Rongqie,? Sounds velvet. The same meaning. One said to receive.　[Jiyun] Nongjiang cut, sound pus. If you read it flatly. The same meaning. [Said Wen] It's suffocating again.　[Jiyun] Anxiously talk about cutting. Same as Yan. See Note to Zhuanzi.
Pinch
